definitions.text: inclined to shake as from weakness or defect
examples: a wobbly chair with shaky legs
the ladder felt a little wobbly
the bridge still stands though one of the arches is wonky

definitions.text: vibrating slightly and irregularly; as e.g. with fear or cold or like the leaves of an aspen in a breeze
examples: the quaking child asked for more
quivering leaves of a poplar tree
sparkling light from the shivering crystals of the chandelier
